Search.prompt: Describe what you are looking for...

cookieBanner.message: We use cookies to improve your experience.

Listing.chat_unavailable_desc: This apartment doesn't have an owner assigned yet. Please try again later or contact support.

Landing.find_perfect_home: Find your perfect student home with our AI-powered search. Browse verified listings near your university.
Landing.connect_students: Connect with thousands of verified students. Manage listings, viewings, and payments in one place.
Landing.everything_needed: Everything You Need for Student Living
Landing.comprehensive_tools: Comprehensive tools and features designed specifically for students
Landing.ai_search_desc: Tell us your story in natural language. Our AI understands your preferences and finds perfect matches.
Landing.saved_searches_desc: Save your searches and get instant notifications when new apartments match your criteria.
Landing.messaging_desc: Chat directly with owners while keeping your contact information private until you're ready.
Landing.reviews_desc: Read authentic reviews from verified students who have actually lived in the apartments.
Landing.viewing_desc: Schedule apartment viewings directly through the platform with automated reminders.
Landing.trust_desc: Comprehensive verification and security measures to protect both students and owners.
Landing.ready_title: Ready to Find Your Perfect Student Apartment?
Landing.ready_desc: Join thousands of students who have found their ideal home with our AI-powered platform
